title: Rav Yitzchok Aryeh Leibush Halpern Passes
body: Rav Yitzchok Aryeh Leibush Halpern zt”l, Av Beis Din of Radomishla in Yerushalayim, passed away at 81, six months after his son's petirah.

title: Satmar Rebbes Lead Protest
body: Thousands gathered outside the Israeli Consulate in Manhattan, led by Satmar Rebbes Rav Aharon Teitelbaum and Rav Zalman Leib Teitelbaum, to protest the arrest of yeshiva bochurim for refusing military conscription.

title: Tens of Thousands Gather for Torah Event
body: Tens of thousands of bnei yeshiva from across Eretz Yisroel gathered at the Pais Arena for the Amudei Olam event, an unprecedented display of kavod haTorah and achdus, led by gedolei Yisroel including Rabbi Dov Landau, Rabbi Moshe Hillel Hirsch, and others.
